TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_tudung, title = tudung, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/tudung} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:學模仿) tudung han ni Lali' ci Ibun muculil mabalucu' ci Ibun. Lali'模仿Ibun走路,Ibun就生氣了.
(kamo no holam:學模仿) todong han ni Lali' ci Ibon mocolil mabaloco' ci Ibon. Lali'模仿Ibon走路,Ibon就生氣了.
